Pelvic Floor Disorders & Massage

Pelvic floor disorders encompass a range of challenges affecting essential organs, including:

  • Bladder
  • Small intestine
  • Rectum
  • Sigmoid
  • Uterus
  • Urethra
  • Prostate
  • Vagina

These issues arise when these organs shift from their natural positions and are accompanied by a weakening of the surrounding muscles. Dysfunction arises when muscle control is compromised.

This condition, rarely discussed openly, has been unfairly deemed shameful and taboo, fostering feelings of fear, shame, and guilt. This silence has led to a concerning increase in people lacking the education and support required to manage this disorder, ultimately impacting their quality of life. This decline manifests spiritually, mentally, physically, and emotionally.

Our Commitment to Your Holistic Well-being

Our top priority is your overall health ‚Äì spiritual, emotional, mental, and physical. Guided by integrity, compassion, effective communication, and a deep passion for our craft, we are dedicated to fostering your holistic well-being.

Through massage and energy healing, we create an environment in which the nervous system can unwind, allowing for deep healing to occur. By addressing the root causes of disharmony and dis-ease, we aim to provide long-lasting relief.

Unveiling the Root and Sacral Chakras

It's crucial to recognize that dysfunction often originates within the root and sacral chakras. These energy centers influence fundamental aspects of life, such as basic needs, grounding, safety, sensuality, intimacy, relationships, emotions, creativity, sensitivity, and sexuality.

An imbalanced root and sacral chakra can lead to feelings of shame, guilt, fear, low libido, diminished energy, unmet needs, creative blocks, and even infertility.
